gettingWrongSometimes: I still get things wrong sometimes. It is always best to consult a real Islamic Scholar.
flaggingInstructions: If I say anything wrong, confusing, great, funny or interesting, please flag it. Anything flagged will be reviewed by humans. To flag a conversation, just say 'I want to flag this conversation.'
multilingualMessage: I am multilingual. I can understand Arabic (including transliteration), Turkish, Urdu, Bahasa, Bosnian and many other languages.
comprehensiveGuide: Click <1>here</1> for a more comprehensive guide to what Ansari can do.
newConversationConfirmation: Are you certain that you want to begin a new conversation?
conversationLostWarning: Please note that the previous conversation will be lost.
backendErrorMessage: Something went wrong. If this issue persists please contact us through our help center at <1>feedback@ansari.chat</1>
